title: Source of funds/wealth declarations
dataVerified: Customer name, income sources, asset origins, employment history
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Employment letters, tax returns, sale agreements verify wealth origin. Domain binding verifies each source (employer, tax authority, notary). Prevents money laundering via fake wealth sources. AML compliance.
